description:
End workspace scrubbing when the user clicks on the trackpad.

BUG=177129
Test=Manual, see bug

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=183584

messages.text: James, can you please take a look?

One question since I don't understand this code that well.

https://codereview.chromium.org/12294050/diff/1/ash/wm/workspace/workspace_cycler.cc
File ash/wm/workspace/workspace_cycler.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/12294050/diff/1/ash/wm/workspace/workspace_cycler.cc#newcode107
ash/wm/workspace/workspace_cycler.cc:107: event->StopPropagation();
Do you want to return after this line in the ET_SCROLL_FLING_START case?  I think you'll still get OnScrollEvent called for that event, which doesn't match the previous behavior.  Is that case supposed to be handled differently?

James, can you please take another look?

I added a return for clarity.
It does not matter much because WorkspaceCycler::OnScrollEvent() would return almost immediately in the case of ET_SCROLL_FLING_START

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/pkotwicz@chromium.org/12294050/5001

subject: End workspace scrubbing when the user clicks on the trackpad
